member.summary: Defines if output must conform to XML, instead of HTML.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.CanRead
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading. Always returns true for the ParserReader class.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing. Always returns false for the ParserReader class.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.BaseReaderPosition
member.summary: Gets the position within the underlying stream.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.MaxReaderPosition
member.summary: Gets the maximum position within the underlying stream.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the character at the specified index or -1 if no more characters are available.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.BufferedTextLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the currently buffered text.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.HtmlParser.ParseReader.BufferedText
member.summary: Gets the currently buffered text.
